amendment.description: Amendment reduces the unobligated balances in the FAA airport improvement program by $300 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 1 and printed in H. Rept. 106-196 to rescind contract authorization for Grants-in-Aid for Airports, Airport and Airway Trust Fund, by $300 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
